          <title>
            <string language="en">Smoking and drugs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rauchen und Drogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tabagisme et drogues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fumar e drogas</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online interactive unit about smoking, drugs and drug abuse and its dangers.</string>
          </description>

κάπνισμα, τα φάρμακα και την κατάχρηση ναρκωτικών ουσιών και τους
κινδύνους του.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad interactiva en línea sobre fumar,
